plants.name: Sunflower
plants.description: A tall annual plant of the daisy family, with very large golden-rayed flowers.
plants.care: Requires full sun and well-drained soil. Water regularly.

plants.name: Rose
plants.description: A woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae.
plants.care: Needs at least six hours of direct sun. Water deeply and regularly.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.description: A diverse and widespread family of flowering plants, with colorful and fragrant blooms.
plants.care: Requires bright, indirect light. Water once a week.

plants.name: Venus Flytrap
plants.description: A carnivorous plant native to subtropical wetlands on the East Coast of the United States.
plants.care: Needs boggy, nutrient-poor soil and high humidity. Feed with insects.
